# spongecase

Convert text to Spongebob case.

## Installation

    pip install spongecase

Or:

    brew install nkouevda/nkouevda/spongecase

## Examples

    $ echo the quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog | spongecase
    tHe QuIcK bRoWn FoX jUmPs OvEr The LaZy DoG
